languages.text: {n}Дебоширы были строго наказаны, несколько десятков наглецов умерли от жажды в ходе епитимьи, а остальные присмирели.{/n}
{n}The rebels were severely punished. Several dozen of the insolent renegades have died of thirst as a result of this penance, and the rest have been subdued.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Дебоширы были строго наказаны, несколько десятков наглецов умерли от жажды в ходе епитимьи, а остальные присмирели.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The rebels were severely punished, several dozens of the insolent men have died of thirst in the course of the pilgrimage of penance, and the rest have been subdued.{/n}
{n}The rebels were severely punished, several dozens of the insolent men have died of thirst in the course of the pilgrimage of penance, and the rest have been subdued.{/n}
{n}The rebels were severely punished. Several dozen of the insolent renegades have died of thirst as a result of this penance, and the rest have been subdued.{/n}
{n}The rebels were severely punished. Several dozen of the insolent renegades have died of thirst during the pilgrimage of penance, and the rest have been subdued.{/n}

{n}The rebels were severely punished. Several dozen of the insolent renegades have died of thirst as a result of this penance, and the rest have been subdued.{/n}

{n}The rebels were severely punished. Several dozen of the insolent renegades have died of thirst as a result of this penance, and the rest have been subdued.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这些叛逆分子受到了严厉的惩罚。几十个傲慢的叛徒在忏悔之旅中被活活渴死，其余的人则纷纷屈服。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rebels were severely punished. Several dozen of the insolent renegades have died of thirst as a result of this penance, and the rest have been subdued.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这些叛逆分子受到了严厉的惩罚。几十个傲慢的叛徒在忏悔之旅中被活活渴死，其余的人则纷纷屈服。{/n}
{n}这些叛逆分子受到了严厉的惩罚。几十个傲慢的叛徒在忏悔之旅中死于干渴，其余的人则纷纷屈服。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los rebeldes sufrieron un castigo severo. Veintenas de los insolentes renegados han muerto de sed como resultado de su penitencia y el resto han sido sometidos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rebels were severely punished. Several dozen of the insolent renegades have died of thirst as a result of this penance, and the rest have been subdued.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los rebeldes sufrieron un castigo severo. Veintenas de los insolentes renegados han muerto de sed como resultado de su penitencia y el resto han sido sometidos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}反乱軍は厳しく罰せられた。数十人の傲慢な反逆者が懺悔の巡礼中に喉の渇きで命を落とし、残りの者は鎮圧された。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rebels were severely punished. Several dozen of the insolent renegades have died of thirst as a result of this penance, and the rest have been subdued.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}反乱軍は厳しく罰せられた。数十人の傲慢な反逆者が懺悔の巡礼中に喉の渇きで命を落とし、残りの者は鎮圧された。{/n}
{n}反乱軍は厳しく罰せられた。数十人の傲慢な反逆者が懺悔の巡礼中に喉の渇きで命を落とし、残りの者は鎮圧された。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les rebelles sont sévèrement punis. Ces renégats insolents meurent de soif par dizaines lors de leur pénitence, et les survivants sont remis dans le droit chemin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rebels were severely punished. Several dozen of the insolent renegades have died of thirst as a result of this penance, and the rest have been subdued.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les rebelles sont sévèrement punis. Ces renégats insolents meurent de soif par dizaines lors de leur pénitence, et les survivants sont remis dans le droit chemin.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Rebellen wurden streng bestraft. Mehrere Dutzend der unverfrorenen Abtrünnigen starben aufgrund dieser Buße, der Rest wurde unterworfen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rebels were severely punished. Several dozen of the insolent renegades have died of thirst as a result of this penance, and the rest have been subdued.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Rebellen wurden streng bestraft. Mehrere Dutzend der unverfrorenen Abtrünnigen starben aufgrund dieser Buße, der Rest wurde unterworfen.{/n}
{n}Die Rebellen wurden streng bestraft. Mehrere Dutzend der unverfrorenen Abtrünnigen sind während der Pilgerreiße verdurstet, der Rest wurde in die Knie gezwungen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İsyancılar ağır bir cezaya çarptırıldı. Küstah hainlerden onlarcası, bu kefaret yolculuğunda susuzluktan can verdi. Gerisiyse hizaya getirildi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rebels were severely punished. Several dozen of the insolent renegades have died of thirst as a result of this penance, and the rest have been subdued.{/n}
